reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The overall objective is stronger global evaluation community actively contributing to field of evaluation at national levels in line with the Global Evaluation Agenda 2016?2020. Specific objectives include: (I) Strengthened individual capacities of evalua tors in general to become confident evaluators who conduct credible evaluations. (II) Strengthened individual capacities of young and emerging evaluators to reach next level of the profession with ability to conduct credible evaluations. (III) Roadmap for future of global evaluation community is finalized with multi stakeholder participation. Activities aim to increase regional capacity development opportunities through the provision of bursary scheme pools to attend the regional conferences organised by Af rEA EvalMENA and IPEN (during 2016) and ReLAC CoE?SA and RFE (during2017). The project will also provide of travel grants to Southern evaluators whose papers are accepted at major evaluation conferences. Support to representatives of VOPE partners from ODA eligible countries to participate in meetings andinitiatives that will be held to follow up the 2015 Global Evaluation Forum and implementation of the Global Evaluation Agenda 2016?2020. Funding will be used for a communication and networking strategy.
